SEARCH
Package com.example.bankcards.controller.impl

Class CardController

java.lang.Object
com.example.bankcards.controller.impl.CardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardApi
@RestController public class CardController extends Object implements CardApi
Реализация CardApi. Делегирует операции по сервисам CardService и BlockRequestService.
